alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Crockett and southern Gibson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trenton, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Gadsden, Gibson, Laneview, Tuckers Corner, Gibson Wells, Fruitland, Cades, New Enterprise, Mason Grove, Mount Orange, Brazil, Vaughns Grove, Coxville, Georgetown and Moores Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
